message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $150 to me. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled benefits and experiences. Considering its quality and the effort put into it, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $140. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further.
